entry.title: First Post
entry.content:
First blog posts are always so awkward.

This octopress thing is going to force me to use markdown so the rest of this post is going to be pretty contrived.

This is a test link to my personal website. You’ll note that this should link directly back here.

Here is one of my favorite quotes by Miranda July:

What a terrible mistake to let go of something wonderful for something real.

Hopefully this page will render properly so I can get to writing about things that actually mean something to me.

Stay tuned!
